N = int(input())
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

count = 0

for i in a:
    while i % 2 == 0:
        i /= 2
        count += 1

print(count)
import sys

# input
N = int(input())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

# solve
ans = 0
for i in range(N):
    while A[i] % 2 == 0:
        A[i] /= 2
        ans += 1

print(ans)


import sys

# input
N = int(input())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))  # プログラムを実行して入力

# solve
ans = 0
for i in range(N):
    while A[i] % 2 == 0:
        A[i] //= 2
        ans += 1

print(ans)

n = int(input())
a = [int(x) for x in input().split(',')]
b = [int(x) for x in input().split(',')]

count_a = 0
count_b = 0

for i in range(n):
    if (a[i] > b[i]):
        count_a += 1
    elif (a[i] < b[i]):
        count_b += 1

print(count_a, count_b)


N = int(input())
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

count = 0

for i in range(N):
    i = a[i]
    while i % 2 == 0:
        i /= 2
        count += 1

print(count)

# https://atcoder.jp/contests/abc117/tasks/abc117_a


N = int(input())
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

count = 0

for i in a:
    while i % 2 == 0:
        i /= 2
        count += 1

print(count)


N = int(input())  # number of items
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]  # items

count = 0  # number of 2's

for i in a:  # for each item
    while i % 2 == 0:
        i /= 2  # divide by 2
        count += 1  # add 1 to count

print(count)  # print count
